<title level="1" pfs="">[Agradaemon (Conflagration Daemon)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1018)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Equal parts lion, spider, and demagogue, agradaemons are born from the forge-flames of [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=136), Horseman of War. Although they're unwilling to work alongside each other for long, agradaemons frequently establish themselves as leaders of cults whose goal is to burn civilization to the ground. To these scheming monsters of flame and fear, torching a city is a mere diversion; incinerating a nation's entire agricultural system to turn its citizens into starving marauders before setting their forests and plains ablaze is truly satisfying.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 44

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Daemon_Agradaemon.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 19">[Agradaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1018)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Daemon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=213" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 79</row>

**Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +37, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +37, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +39

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +10

**Con** +5

**Int** +6

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +10
</row>

**Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn't impair an agradaemon's vision; it ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 45 

**Fort** +31 

**Ref** +36 

**Will** +31 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 400

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)

**Weaknesses**
cold 20, good 20

**Choking Smog** ([air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) 100 feet. The agradaemon is surrounded by ashy smoke. Creatures within the aura are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and creatures outside of it are concealed to creatures within it. Non-[daemon](/Traits.aspx?ID=213) creatures can't breathe in the aura and must hold their breath or [suffocate](/Rules.aspx?ID=468).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+14 slashing plus 2d6 fire and 2d6 evil

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lava bomb +35 ([range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 4d8 fire plus 2d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) plus 8 fire splash

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 41
- **1st**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; good only)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)
- **8th**
[Volcanic Eruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=360) (×3)
- **10th**
[Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186)

**Daemonic Pledge** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The agradaemon designates a single willing mortal as a pledged fanatic. That creature gains resistance to fire equal to its level, immunity to the agradaemon's choking smog aura, and smoke vision. The agradaemon can have up to 10 pledged fanatics at one time and can remove the status from any number of pledged fanatics as a free action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait. The status can also be removed with an [_atone_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=2) ritual.

**Proven Devotion** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The agradaemon regains 15 Hit Points, and a pledged fanatic of the agradaemon's choice that it can see loses 15 Hit Points (no effects apply that would decrease this Hit Point loss). A pledged creature that dies in this way explodes and deals 9d10 fire damage in a 20-foot emanation (DC 41 basic Reflex save).

**[Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30)** <actions string="Single Action" />  claw

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Soul Fuel</title>

Whatever heat lay beneath the wastes of [Abaddon](/Planes.aspx?ID=12) bled away eons ago. Thereafter, the smiths forging weapons for [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=136), Horseman of War, turned to mortal souls as fuel for their fires. The flames of these unholy forges can generate profane creatures, and agradaemons are among the worst of these.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-26" />
